---
title: Ng'etuny
locale: kln
statusTranslation: automatic
coverImage: https://lhvmrqwrcowdvduuaukz.supabase.co/storage/v1/object/public/strapi-uploads/small_cover-educacion-fundamental.webp-2d51a7828a2b1309555be27f7e2a61a0.webp
sidebar:
    label: 4. Ng'etuny
    order: 4
---
Walimu ne bo chebo sukul, kolejinik ak yunibesiti ko kiibochi ng'alek che mengech kotokchini koboto kole kobetut koboishee bendi itunon chebo kitabu nii.

Kimong'u koityi sukul, kolejinik, yunibesitinik, ak koleen, ko kemii kiyokchini kole ng'alek che mengech, miising, ng'alek che yaach, itikich, ak koleen.

Ng'alech che mengech ko kiyokchini ko KUTOROS KONDAET. Walimu chebo sukul ko kiibochi kutorosin kondet.

Keketoret koboto kondet, koboto koitung' kong'u ng'alek. Keketoret koboto kondet chebo torornatet ne yaach ak keboisyee boisionik ak ketorossin.

Keketoret koboto kondet chebo torornatet ne yaach chebo kibeleshek, torornatet ne yaach chebo maamweeshe, maamweeshe kobendi sukul, kokule, kocheer, komwoochi walimu, kokwong'u miising, ak koleen.

Walimu chebo kurgat ak chebo koito kiibochi ng'alek che mengech ko kobendi koboto koboto koyookchini koboto koyookchini kobendi komiis, kibeleshek kobendi sukul, koyookchini koboto kotoros walimu, ak koito kokonyoonin, ak koleen.

Kemi koleen koboto boisionik koboto koyookchini koboto koyookchini kolal, koboto kole kobendi ko kiyookchini, koboto kole kiyookchini, koboto kole kiyookchini, koboto kole kiyookchini, koboto kole kiyookchini, koboto kole kiyookchini, koboto kole kiyookchini.

Maamweeshe kiyookchini koboto kobendi
